about_the_game:
Jax: History Repeats Itself is a game similar to other animatronic-horror games, but with a twist.
Powered the latest Unreal Engine game technology, this is the first (slightly) realistic, and most elaborate game ever made by GameSharp.

STORY

You are lacking money, so you must find a job quick. You find an ad on a newspaper. You see that a warehouse is hiring guards, but first you're going to need to guard Jax's Burgers, a strange bootleg copy of another popular party place, for 5 nights. The place is known to... have its problems, and having almost directly plagiarized another company's code for their animatronics, whatever happens to them, happens to Jax's Burgers, and we all know how the other company turned out...

FEATURES

- Realistic lighting effects
- Easy to learn controls
- Fairly realistic screen effects
And more!
(Refer to the "What is the current state of Early Access?" section for more details.)

Software used
Unreal Engine 5.3.1

Audacity
DaFont
Blender 3.2-4.0
FL Studio 21

Fonts used
Roboto (Google Fonts)
Perfect Dos VGA 437 (DaFont)

Sounds from


ElevenLabs

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 11 Big Sur or newer
  • Processor: Apple M1+ or Intel
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Big Sur or newer
  • Processor: Apple M1+ or Intel
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Jax: History Repeats Itself

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: it's 2023 who needs a sound card
  • Additional Notes: System Requirements may change throughout development.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Sound Card: why

short_description: Jax: History Repeats Itself is a horror game where you follow the story of Ernel, a young man hired as a security guard, to complete a series of shifts at Jax's Burgers to get a job at JHR Warehouses.
